thread.title: Government Is Popular If Someone Else Pays

author: wsjcom
title: Government Is Popular If Someone Else Pays
text:
Regarding William A. Galston’s “Americans Want Big Government” (Politics & Ideas, Feb. 14): I don’t believe Americans want “big” government. I do believe that many Americans want something for nothing, i.e., they want the government to give them more than they pay in, and they don’t stop to think about who pays for the difference (as long as it isn’t them) nor to think about who will pay for the national debt (as long as it isn’t them).
I don’t believe politicians have any incentive to be responsible for enlightening Americans...
